DOC.brief_summary: Traumatic sesamoid displacement of the first metacarpophalangeal joint can affect thumb function.
DOC.brief_title: A Case of Sesamoid Displacement Causing the First Metacarpophalangeal Joint Locking
DOC.detailed_description: Although occurrence is rare, the mechanism of the displacement is commonly complex and varied. Understanding the mechanism is critical for treatment of the disorder. We herein present a locked thumb MCPJ caused by sesamoid displacement.
DOC.criteria: Traumatic sesamoid displacement Pathologic sesamoid disorder
DOC.keyword: radial condylar ridge of the metacarpal head.
